meanings.definition: A building material made from clay and straw
meanings.sent1: The house was constructed using adobe for its walls.
meanings.sent2: In the desert, many homes are built with adobe bricks.
meanings.sent3: The adobe walls kept the house cool in the scorching sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as the color of adobe.
meanings.sent5: The adobe material gave the building a rustic charm.

meanings.definition: A type of brick or building block made from adobe
meanings.sent1: The workers stacked adobe bricks to build the wall.
meanings.sent2: The adobe blocks were sturdy and durable.
meanings.sent3: The adobe bricks looked like delicious brownies.
meanings.sent4: The adobe blocks formed a solid foundation for the house.
meanings.sent5: The adobe building blocks were easy to work with.

meanings.definition: A style of architecture using adobe bricks
meanings.sent1: The adobe architecture of the house blended well with the surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The adobe style of building is common in the region.
meanings.sent3: The adobe design gave the house a unique flair.
meanings.sent4: The adobe architecture stood out among the modern buildings.
meanings.sent5: The adobe construction showcased traditional craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: A color resembling the natural earth tones of adobe buildings
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely adobe shade.
meanings.sent2: The artist used adobe color to capture the essence of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The adobe hue of the walls made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The adobe tone of the painting evoked a sense of warmth.
meanings.sent5: The adobe color of the curtains matched the furniture perfectly.
